338680.name: SpeedRunners Demo
338680.description:
SpeedRunners is a cut-throat multiplayer running game that pits 4 players against each other - locally and/or online. Run, jump, swing around, and use devious pick-ups and weapons to knock your opponents off-screen.

The Party Mode contains the full SpeedRunners experience for a party setting. It works with local multiplayer only, and will run itself if nobody is playing. We highly encourage you to try this demo for a local multiplayer party, it's the same one we use at shows like PAX and Gamescom.

  • 3 of the most popular maps - SS Royale, Theme Park, Alley
  • 4 characters that spawn as bots, simply pick up a controller to take control of one
  • All the gameplay features of SpeedRunners

The full game has much more:

  • Online Multiplayer - SpeedRunners is one of the few indie games with fully functional online multiplayer
  • Ranked Leaderboards - Earn points to level up in the ranks, do you have what it takes to become a Gold League player?
  • 10+ official maps
  • A level editor integrated with Steam Workshop, and over 6,000 user created levels!
  • Origins mode - a single player campaign about the origins of SpeedRunner
  • Play as Falcon, the coolest character of them all
  • Quality Time with the Speedrunners Community™
  • Participate in 60-page long game discussion threads about why spikes aren't lethal anymore
  • Suggest copyrighted Marvel characters, because if one runs fast or has a grappling hook, it's a great fit into the universe
  • If you speak Russian - understand the origins of Cosmonaut Comrade (this is not true)
  • Play in any combination - online, bots, offline, or online friends. You can be sitting with 2 people playing against one bot, and another person online. You have no idea how difficult it is to design such edge-cases.
338680.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
